subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Many N.F.L. prospects prepare for the annual N.F.L. Scouting Combine by attending specialized training programs, like the one at the Parisi Speed School in Fair Lawn, N.J.
snippet: Many N.F.L. prospects prepare for the annual N.F.L. Scouting Combine by attending specialized training programs, like the one at the Parisi Speed School in Fair Lawn, N.J.
